pages.text: As I learn and improve my technology I remember working through these problems in my past. It's almost as if the act of re-discovering this knowledge is triggering some of my memories to return. One memory that seems particularly important was that of me crafting a small token, a mysterious eye from materials like leather and bronze. I crafted a duplicate following  the steps I used in my memory.
I can't remember what it's for, only that it was very important. I should keep it safe. If I remember other tokens I will recreate them as well.
